bug.author: Naviden
bug.summary: Problem with opening some of datasets (nlp/viewer)
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
The following datasets can't be opened:
tiny_shakespeare xnli blog_authorship_corpus c4 definite_pronoun_resolution discofuse
<denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
What are the steps we should take to reproduce the bug:
Go to https://huggingface.co/nlp/viewer/ Select any dataset mentioned above from the dropdown list
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
Showing a preview of data <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
Throwing FileNotFoundError or ModuleNotFoundError

comments.comment:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Naviden>@Naviden</denchmark-link> - Thanks for checking out Streamlit. HuggingFace isn't our project, but rather a separate entity that happens to use Streamlit. You can report any issues with their project on the proper repo at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/huggingface>https://github.com/huggingface</denchmark-link>
Best, Randy
